title: "RADS Error" - The Easiest Fix - Should Work For Everyone
body:
I stumbled across this error today, after researching how to resolve the issue, & trying different things for about an hour, nothing I tried was working. I see there's still people with this issue, and hopefully this thread can help you resolve your issue very easily. 

**Step 1:**
Restart your computer, as it's restarting tap F2 when you see the Gateway Logo, this will enter you into your computer's BIOS Setup.

**Step 2:**
Navigate with your 4 arrow keys, press the right arrow key to get to the "Exit", or "Save and Exit" section.
Navigate down with your arrow key to "Restore Defaults", or "Load Setup Defaults", press enter, select yes. Save the changes and exit.

Your computer should now restart or finish restarting, if you had web access issues(trying to look up resolutions), or issues connecting to League of Legends, it should now be resolved. If this thread helped you please like it to help get it pinned for others to easily see, not sure how the League forum system works.

replies.body: These are some unsafe steps, and not the first I would recommend.  The RADS error usually happens when some security setting within the OS or even anti virus is blocking the patcher or game from launching.  Messing around BIOS might be risky and damage your PC, so I wouldn't suggest this.  Instead, the instructions in our [permissions](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) guide are more likely to resolve cases like this!
